verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician בִּנְגִינ֗וֹת <WH5058> [Tbin-gi-Not, on Neginoth מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David בְּקָרְאִ֡י <WH7121> be-ka-re-'I me when I call עֲנֵ֤נִי׀ <WH6030> 'a-Ne-ni Hear אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-Lo-Hei O God צִדְקִ֗י <WH6664> tzid-Ki, of my righteousness בַּ֭צָּר <WH6862> Batz-tzor me [when I was] in distress הִרְחַ֣בְתָּ <WH7337> hir-Chav-ta thou hast enlarged לִּ֑י Li; חָ֝נֵּ֗נִי <WH2603> chon-ne-ni have mercy וּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> u-she-Ma' upon me and hear תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti. my prayer

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei O ye sons אִ֡ישׁ <WH376> 'ish of men עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- how long מֶ֬ה <WH4100> meh how כְבוֹדִ֣י <WH3519> che-vo-Di [will ye turn] my glory לִ֭כְלִמָּה <WH3639> Lich-lim-mah confusion תֶּאֱהָב֣וּן <WH157> te-'e-ha-Vun love רִ֑יק <WH7385> Rik; vanity תְּבַקְשׁ֖וּ <WH1245> te-vak-Shu [and] seek כָזָ֣ב <WH3577> cha-Zav deceitful סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

וּדְע֗וּ <WH3045> u-de-'U, But know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הִפְלָ֣ה <WH6395> hif-Lah hath set apart יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD חָסִ֣יד <WH2623> cha-Sid him that is godly ל֑וֹ lo; יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for himself the LORD יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> yish-Ma', will hear בְּקָרְאִ֥י <WH7121> be-ka-re-'I when I call אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> 'e-Lav. about

רִגְז֗וּ <WH7264> rig-Zu, Stand in awe וְֽאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תֶּ֫חֱטָ֥אוּ <WH2398> te-che-Ta-'u and sin אִמְר֣וּ <WH559> 'im-Ru not commune בִ֭לְבַבְכֶם <WH3824> Vil-vav-chem with your own heart עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon מִשְׁכַּבְכֶ֗ם <WH4904> mish-kav-Chem, upon your bed וְדֹ֣מּוּ <WH1826> ve-Dom-mu and be still סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

זִבְח֥וּ <WH2076> ziv-Chu Offer זִבְחֵי־ <WH2077> ziv-chei- the sacrifices צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek; of righteousness וּ֝בִטְח֗וּ <WH982> u-vit-Chu, and put your trust אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. in the LORD

רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> rab-Bim [There be] many אֹמְרִים֮ <WH559> 'o-me-Rim that say מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Who יַרְאֵ֪נוּ֫ <WH7200> yar-'E-nu Who will shew ט֥וֹב <WH2896> Tov good נְֽסָה־ <WH5375> ne-sah- lift thou up עָ֭לֵינוּ <WH5921> 'A-lei-nu up א֨וֹר <WH216> or the light פָּנֶ֬יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha of thy countenance יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. LORD

נָתַ֣תָּה <WH5414> na-Tat-tah Thou hast put שִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> sim-Chah gladness בְלִבִּ֑י <WH3820> ve-lib-Bi; in my heart מֵעֵ֬ת <WH6256> me-'Et more than in the time דְּגָנָ֖ם <WH1715> de-ga-Nam [that] their corn וְתִֽירוֹשָׁ֣ם <WH8492> ve-ti-ro-Sham and their wine רָֽבּוּ׃ <WH7231> Rab-bu. increased

בְּשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> be-sha-Lom in peace יַחְדָּו֮ <WH3162> yach-Dav I will both אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <WH7901> 'esh-ke-Vah lay me down וְאִ֫ישָׁ֥ן <WH3462> ve-'I-Shan and sleep כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah O יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for thou LORD לְבָדָ֑ד <WH910> le-va-Dad; only לָ֝בֶ֗טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach, in safety תּוֹשִׁיבֵֽנִי׃ <WH3427> to-shi-Ve-ni. makest me dwell
